duties_responsibilities.duty: Presenting and leasing a community to prospective residents
Leasing apartments and providing customer service
Renewing leases and participating in community marketing
Inspecting models and market vacancies daily, maintaining office presentation
Responding to leasing inquiries and internet leads
Greeting and presenting property to prospective residents through personalized tours
Actively marketing and promoting the apartment community
Inputting Yardi data, compiling welcome paperwork, and establishing move-in appointments
Gathering competitive market information and preparing routine reports
Maintaining priority wait list, providing customer service, and handling resident concerns

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent required. College degree or some college preferred.
